text: I finished all sixteen episodes of Bablylon Berlin. It was quite a ride. And at the end I'm not sure exactly what happened. I needed this summary to convince me that I did/do. Would I recommend it? It's a roller coaster. Dark. Some scenes are hard to watch. The song is addictive. You fall in love with the characters. Would I watch it again? Not sure. But the ending isn't exactly Singin' in the Rain. ðŸ’ƒðŸ•º
